title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Practice-Based Projects for Enhancing Early Childhood Mathematics Instructional Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Early Childhood Education Theory and Understanding of Mathematics Education Theory
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain early childhood mathematics activity design plans that consider family and relational contexts beyond age-segregated education.
Learners can apply age-appropriate mathematical manipulatives and teaching methods to early childhood developmental stages through project-based practice.
Learners can produce and evaluate early childhood mathematics education project outcomes using digital tools (tablets, educational apps).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
